alert.note: Alert for Chelan (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 5:13PM PDT until May 20 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM PDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CHELAN COUNTY... At 512 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stevens Pass, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stevens Pass, Merrit, Telma, Rock Island Campground, Riverside Campground, Lake Creek Campground, Lake Wenatchee Campground, White Pine Campground, and French Creek Campground. This includes U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 65 and 81. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
